Cookies.DESCRIPTION: We use cookies and similar technologies that are necessary to run our Websites (essential cookies). We also use Analytics, Functionality, and Targeting cookies to analyze our Websites’ traffic, optimize your experience, personalize content, and serve targeted advertisements.

CookiesPage.TITLE: Cookie Policy
CookiesPage.DESCRIPTION: This page explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can control them.

TYPES.TECHNICAL: Technical cookies: Necessary for the website to function.
TYPES.ANALYTICS: Analytics cookies: Used to collect anonymous statistical data.
TYPES.PROFILING: Profiling cookies: Used to personalize advertising content.

CookiesPage.MANAGE_DESCRIPTION: You can disable cookies by changing your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may cause some parts of the website to not function properly.

TermsPage.TITLE: Terms and Conditions
TermsPage.DESCRIPTION: By using our website, you agree to the following terms and conditions.
TermsPage.USE_DESCRIPTION: The website is available for personal use only. Commercial use of the website is not allowed without our written approval.
TermsPage.INTELLECTUAL_DESCRIPTION: All content on the website, including text, images, and logos, are owned by us and protected by copyright.
TermsPage.CHANGES_DESCRIPTION: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the website constitutes acceptance of the updated Terms.

PrivacyPage.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.DESCRIPTION: This page describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data.
PrivacyPage.COLLECTION_DESCRIPTION: We collect personal data such as your name, email address, and phone number when you interact with our website.
PrivacyPage.USE_DESCRIPTION: We use the collected data to improve our service and personalize the user experience.
PrivacyPage.PROTECTION_DESCRIPTION: We take security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access and disclosure.

justEatDescription.title: About Just Eat
justEatDescription.content: Just Eat (www.justeat.it) is part of Just Eat Takeaway.com, one of the global leaders in the digital food delivery market. It has been operating in Italy since 2011 and today works with over 28,000 restaurant partners in more than 2,000 municipalities. Just Eat is accessible from both PC and mobile through the dedicated app or mobile site version, ensuring everyone a wide variety of cuisines to choose from.

justEatTakeawayDescription.title: Just Eat Takeaway.com
justEatTakeawayDescription.content: Just Eat Takeaway.com (LSE: JET, AMS: TKWY) is one of the global leaders in the digital food delivery market. Based in Amsterdam, the company connects customers and restaurant partners through its platform. With over 680,000 restaurant partners, Just Eat Takeaway.com offers a wide variety of choices. Just Eat and Takeaway.com have quickly grown to become leaders in the online food delivery market with operations in the United States, United Kingdom, Germany, Netherlands, Canada, Australia, Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Denmark, France, Ireland, Israel, Italy, Luxembourg, New Zealand, Poland, Slovakia, Spain, Switzerland.
